full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement - Type 2 Low Profile Ambulance

### Tender Identification

* **Procurement Reference Number:** cb-5333-37541591
* **Solicitation Number:** W6399-22LI06/B
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Publication Date:** May 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 22, 2023, 14:00:00

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of Type 2 Low Profile Ambulances. This procurement process aims to acquire four (4) vehicles with optional quantities available to National Defence for up to twenty-four (24) months after contract award. The equipment must comply with the technical specifications outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation document.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Tender Requirements

* The tender is open to all qualified suppliers.
* Bids must be submitted in electronic format to the Contracting Authority at Megan.Buchanan@forces.gc.ca.
* The bid closing date is June 22, 2023, at 14:00:00.

### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the RFP and any amendments, are available on the following website:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5333/w6399-22li06_b-rfp-english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5333/w6399-22li06_b-rfp-french.pdf

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or submissions, please contact:

* Name: Megan Buchanan
* Email: Megan.Buchanan@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-945-2929
